title: Who is a better guitarist, Eddie Van Halen or Brian May? - Quora

response.answer_text: Who is a better guitarist, Eddie Van Halen or Brian May? This is like asking “which is better, the apple or the orange?” Each are equally excellent guitarists in their own rights. Eddie’s playing is kind of raw, in-your-face, partying rock-n-roll.  Whereas Brian’s is more melodic, soaring, and relaxing-on-the-couch-with-a-blunt style rock-n-roll.  And both are adept in each one’s own style. Each one has his own unique sound which makes them easily identifiable. Even if you’ve never heard the song before, when you hear Eddie, you know it’s Eddie and the same goes for Brian. And no matter which one you are listening to, you will still pick up your “air-guitar” and jam along until you pass out from the massive head-rush each guitarist gives you.  All images from Bing Images.

That's like comparing apples to oranges! They're both great guitarists just in different ways! Eddie was the first of the modern day innovators and virtuosos and practically invented shredding! Brian May is not as much of a guitar acrobat as EVH but he has a very distinctive tone and expressive style that is all his! Brian May's contribution to Queen's sound is ever bit as important as Eddie's was to Van Halen’s!
